title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Spending in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Spending in billion U.S. dollars is gradually decreasing from 1995 to 2000, rapidly increasing from 2000 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2005 and 2010.
Max Spending in billion U.S. dollars about 80.0 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Spending in billion U.S. dollars about 18.0 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 1995 to 2015.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2020.
